entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
